articles.title: Where does Milton Williams rank among Patriots’ 10 best free-agent signings ever?
articles.description:
Williams has quickly proven that he's worth the contract the Patriots gave him this past offseason.

The post Where does Milton Williams rank among Patriots’ 10 best free-agent signings ever? appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Milton Williams has quickly proven his value to the Patriots this offseason.
Williams is being considered among the top 10 free-agent signings in Patriots history.
His performance may enhance the team's competitiveness for Boston fans this season.

articles.title: 8 lesser discussed potential trade deadline candidates that could make sense for Celtics
articles.description:
The Celtics reportedly are unlikely to take "big swings" ahead of Thursday's deadline.

The post 8 lesser discussed potential trade deadline candidates that could make sense for Celtics appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Celtics unlikely to pursue major trades before the January 31 deadline.
Eight lesser-known trade candidates identified for potential roster improvements.
Local fans may see strategic changes without major player acquisitions.

articles.title: Something in the Way Fest 2026: Live updates from Roadrunner
articles.description:
The two-day festival is bringing indie and alternative rock bands from across the country to Boston’s Roadrunner venue.

The post Something in the Way Fest 2026: Live updates from Roadrunner appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Something in the Way Fest 2026 takes place at Roadrunner on January 31 and February 1.
The festival features indie and alternative rock bands from across the country.
Local businesses may benefit from increased foot traffic during the two-day event.

articles.title: Why the Bruins practiced in a tent on Saturday in Florida
articles.description:
"I can't believe that this is the rink we're playing this game on tomorrow."

The post Why the Bruins practiced in a tent on Saturday in Florida appeared first on Boston.com.
summary: Bruins practiced in a tent on January 30, 2026, due to rink conditions in Florida.
Tent practice aimed to adapt players for the unique outdoor game environment.
Local fans can expect a different game experience at the Stadium Series matchup.
